snippet: With low post defenders Tyson Chandler and Jared Jeffries out with injuries, the Knicks defense continued to struggle in a loss to Milwaukee.
abstract: Milwaukee Bucks beat New York Knicks, 119-114, in NBA action.
lead_paragraph: With low post defenders Tyson Chandler and Jared Jeffries out with injuries, the Knicks defense continued to struggle in a loss to Milwaukee.

headline.seo: Knicks, Unable to Contain Bucks, Lose Fourth Straight
headline.main: Knicks, Unable to Contain Bucks, Lose Fourth Straight
headline.print_headline: Knicks, Still Searching for Right Balance, Drop Their Fourth Straight
